pages.text: You have achieved it! You have created the most powerful thing in the universe! It is in fact, a piece of the universe itself! It shimmers like the night sky, though it is quite useless by itself. To actually utilize this power, it must be combined with other powers...

The $(bold)$(6)Essence of the Universe$() is what truly allows a $(bold)Void Alchemist$() such wonderous power! There are several weapons and armors that can be created with this, of which will be explained in the next section.
